title: Bug 101187: Unable to add localization key when it is blank
description: Bug 101187: Unable to add localization key when it is blank. Description: If the key field is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title when the localization key is left blank.
EB: In the properties file, leave the key field blank while providing a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title. However, the actual result is that the text still cannot be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set externalized text in the chart title. 2. Leave the key field blank and provide a valid value in the properties file. Observe that the text is not displayed in the chart title.
